descriptionlist.description:
Compatible with iOS 6 through 9.0.2
Requires Cydia Installer 1.1.26

Features:

✔️ Install packages free.
✔️ Multiples connections downloads.
✔️ Turbo Mode downloads.
✔️ Blocker ADs.
✔️ Tap&Hold any package to start download has background.
✔️ Backup/Restore all your packages and sources quickly.
✔️ Cache your packages with MD5Sum verification.
✔️ Downgrade any package cached by CyDown.
✔️ Upload files to SendSpace.
✔️ And more others features.
Configure options from Settings.

changelog.change: Thanks for APK.TW for rewritting this tweak and crack the DRM.
